ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] Digest Number 289
ygData.msgSnippet: Thats odd, why is it Alchohol is stackable and right click activateable? - Tony Buser - gr0k - Stranger in a Strange Land --- http://www.juju.org - -
ygData.messageBody:
Thats odd, why is it Alchohol is stackable and right click activateable?

- Tony Buser - gr0k - Stranger in a Strange Land --- http://www.juju.org -
- Ubershadow Leprechaun - Level 40 Gnome Rogue - http://tunares.juju.org -
- perl -e'print pack("H*","54686f752041727420476f640a");' ----------------

On Fri, 23 Jun 2000 jbuckingham@... wrote:

>
> > Stackable fireworks
>
> They've already amde a statement on this, in regard to stackable potions
> for alchemy.
> Aparently, the properties of "right-click activatable" and "stackable" are
> mututally exclusive.
>
> Besides, you really wouldn't want them to try.. Ask a newbie Iksar shaman
> what happened when they tried to make
> normal old mosquito wings stackable - they were out of the game for 2 weeks
> :)
>
>
